title: Dance Tonight
lyrics:
[intro] | (F)  (C)  (F)  (C) | (Bb)  (C)  (F)  (F) |
 
(F) Everybody gonna (C)dance tonight
(F) Everybody gonna (C)feel alright
(Bb) Everybody gonna (C)dance around to(F)night
 
(F) Everybody gonna (C)dance around
(F) Everybody gonna (C)hit the ground
(Bb) Everybody gonna (C)dance around to(F)night
 
(Cm) Well you can come on to my place if you (F)want to
(Cm) You can do anything you want to (C)do
 
(F) Everybody gonna (C)dance tonight
(F) Everybody gonna (C)feel alright
(Bb) Everybody gonna (C)dance around to(F)night
 
[whistling] | (F)  (C)  (F)  (C) | (Bb)  (C)  (F)  (F) |
 
[chorus]
(Cm) Well you can come on to my place if you (F)want to
(Cm) You can do anything you want to (C)do
 
(F) Everybody gonna (C)stamp their feet
(F) Everybody's gonna (C)feel the beat
(Bb) Everybody wanna (C)dance around to(F)night
 
[bridge]
(F) Everybody gonna (C)dance tonight
(F)Everybody gonna (C)feel alright
(Bb) Everybody gonna (C)dance around to(F)night
 
 
(F) Everybody gonna(C)jump and shout
(F) Everybody gonna (C)sing it out
(Bb) Everybody gonna (C)dance around to(F)night
 
[chorus]
(Cm) Well you can come on to my place if you (F)want to
(Cm) You can do anything you want to (C)do
 
(F) Everybody gonna (C)dance tonight
(F) Everybody gonna (C)feel alright
(Bb) Everybody gonna (C)dance around to(F)night  x3
(F-single strum) [end]
